title: What is your reaction on Amazon Prime releasing the 3rd season of Four More Shots instead of Mirzapur Season 2? - Quora
tags: Amazon Prime Video (Video on demand service)

response.answer_text: I don't have any reaction to it because Amazon is not releasing Four More Shots season 3 any time soon. What Amazon did announce was that it has renewed the series for another season. Which means, that Amazon has told the producers to make another season for them. That's it. It will have to be shot first, in order to be released. Mirzapur season 2 on the other hand will be released this year. It's most probably in its final stages. Besides, Amazon will make its decision based on user data. Four more shots presently is the most viewed Indian show on Amazon. Its not a good show. But people like it so surely, Amazon would want to keep the momentum going.
I have never been fan of Four More Shots. So it doesnt really make any difference to me.
